content.text:
# Aniissh Tejeshwar

Aniissh Tejeshwar is an Indian actor who works predominantly in Kannada films. He made a debut with 2010 Kannada film Nam Areal Ond Dina.
Career
Anniish first featured on a Hyderabad magazine cover. After taking a film training course, he debuted with the 2010 Kannada film Nam Areal Ond Dina, which released after Police Quarters. He then acted in several films, including Telugu. He was cast in the 2016 film Akira.
Personal life
Aniissh Tejeshwar lives in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.
